Title: Breakout: Part 1
Director: Sebastian Montes, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Joshua Fine (story), Christopher Yost (story), Christopher Yost
Actors: Eric Loomis, Phil LaMarr, Nolan North, Rick D. Wasserman
Plot: Mysterious attacks on America's maximum security prisons leads to mass outbreaks of super villains, causing Iron Man, Thor, Wasp, Henry Pym, and the Hulk to team together in order to stop them.
